description: it doesn't change your theme or font, you should do it, but it's good!
Takes a bit getting used to, but I was able to create a nice, custom prompt for myself!

I love the potential. I wish it was packaged with at least one NERDFONT, so it would work out of the box.

Also, I don't see how to configure it. The SNAP doesn't seem to allow it to access the normal ~/.config/starship.toml, even after checking the SNAP permisions allowed access to home. I also tried to manually have it be ~/.starship.toml and export STARSHIP_CONFIG. That didn't work either.
summary: Good, but I don't see how to config it with the SNAP

description: It is very good, but for some reason the version I installed using curl (not the snap) kept detecting my Home directory as a GCP project
Rápido, altamente customizável, compatível com vários shells, é o melhor prompt disponível
